title: The Rise of the Meritocracy 1870-2033
description: Book has been read but is in good condition. Very minimal damage to the cover including scuff marks and some dirt, but no holes or tears. Binding has minimal wear. All pages are yellowing a bit but undamaged with no creasing or tearing, no highlighting of text, no writing in margins. No missing pages. Owner's name written at top of introductory page. Kept in nonsmoking adult home or in climate controlled storage by original owner. WILL SHIP VIA USPS MEDIA MAIL WITH DELIVERY CONFIRMATION. FEEL FRE TO ASK ANY QUESTIONS BEFORE PURCHASING
author: Michael Young
